description: Demolition of existing building and structures on the site and erection of 2 buildings, comprising of a 5 storey plus basement/lower ground building facing onto Canonbury Road and a building facing onto Compton Avenue and Edwards Cottages ranging between 4, 3 and 2 storeys all of which are plus a basement/lower ground level .  The buildings will provide for 90 residential units comprising of flats, maisonettes and townhouses.  The proposals include the provision of cycle and refuse stores, plant room, substation, provision of soft and hard landscaping, creation of 2 disabled parking bays and other associated works.  The application constitutes a land use change from operations within the permitted A1 (Retail) use class to C3 (Dwelling houses) use class.
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
